author: Stuart Hatto
comment: Bought this for my Huawei watch and I really love the design, but it does seem to chew through my battery.  One other problem I have is that the watch is supposed to show both zulu and roaming time - mine just shows zulu in both display areas. I would appreciate any hints on how to fix that?  Also when roaming the weather display is blank.  So because of those three niggles I can only give it 3

author: Billy Home
comment: Never showed up as an available watch face for my "LG G Watch R". Tried uninstalling/reinstall, nothing showing up on watch or on phone.  Watch face showed up after a few days.  Not sure the cause of the delay.  It's a little "busy" but displays the info I need to have handy when at work. I wish I could change the "on" colors to something more visible in daylight than green.  But other than that, it does what I need.

author: Richard Hill
comment: I've been after an activity-based face for my Huawei watch and this ticks all the boxes. Yet to see how it's accuracy holds up when skiing, but it's the best I've found so far. Areas for improvement are: 1) Increase the polling time for speed and altitude (I'm going to be zooming!) 2) Remove the second hand for secondary clock (no point imo) 3) vibration feature if bad weather detected within next 3 hours in your location. 4) Touch points to open custom apps like skitracks, maps, weather, or zello. Thanks!
title: Really like the watch face but room for improvement.

author: Trey G
comment: Weather settings have been adjusted correctly in settings but my weather still shows as 588 degrees and so forth for the day. It also kills the battery in my Huawei sport.

author: A Quiver Full Of Love
comment: Edit: originally gave this 5 stars. Later I realized weather doesn't update, altimeter doesn't work, speed doesn't work, and can't get a response via email for support. I want a refund but since devs won't even respond for support it's unlikely. Would be the best face I've found if it worked but it doesn't. Be warned spend your money elsewhere. Shame I wanted a bunch of other watch faces from these guys but I've lost faith.

author: Simon MacMullen
comment: Looks really awesome, assuming you want a busy watch face. If you don't why are you looking at this? :-) Heart rate indicator is cool, I haven't seen another watch face with that feature so I was a bit dubious but it works fine. It would be really nice to be able to set the second time zone, having it UTC only is a bit pointless if you're in the UK!

author: Tristan VonWolfenhasen
comment: Less then ten min and already took 10%
title: Battery killer

author: Philmore Harrison
comment: Excellent Watch face, just that the weather forecast,need to be in two digits, not three digits,Thanks

author: Troy Harmon
comment: This face has more technology in it than the first Apollo space flight

author: andrew pattison
comment: OMG is all I can say fantastic watch face
title: OMG

author: mohd syukri
comment: Awesome

author: Aaron Carolipio
comment: Once again, hopefully this update helps the battery in a huawei watch.  Wish you could change the colors on normal mode.  No brainer.  Get this one!
title: Good looking

author: Carlos Probst
comment: Saw a review of this watch face and decided to try it out - Awesome amount of information in one spot. Only criticism, no one will be fooled that you are wearing a regular watch with it on, but then again I don't care being a tech geek. 😉
title: Wow - All the information!

author: Popov Evgeni
comment: Just bought the face. But it's not showing in my list of watches. Didn't load in my S7 edge, no where to be found. But did charge me ( money gone)
title: No Good

author: Nick Algar
comment: Fantastic. So much information on one screen
title: Waooow

author: Raul Arevalo
comment: Would be five stars if showed current weather.
title: Weather

author: Xitij Sheth
comment: Excellent Information. Just draining battery too fast then normal. Can you please provide a feature which while selecting a window of any info that window gets enlarged otherwise we have to stare for the i fo which is in tiny fonts.

author: Paul Howard
comment: Love it!

author: BF Tongco
comment: Looks nice but it drains battery really fast. And the BPM monitor is fake. My office desk is registering at 121 BPM. My macbook is registering at 117BPM.  THEY'RE ALIVE!!!!!   Update: In response to your question, my watch is an LG G Watch R. Update 1/21: Is BPM going to be fixed?

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Which watch do you have? Heart rate value is watch's sensor data.
For additional question, please feel free to contact our email address.
We can give you a help.
Thank you.

title: BPM IS WAY OFF FIX IT!

author: Harry Hendon
comment: Lots of stuff going on in this face!  So far, it is not a real hog on battery life. Will test more today.  Messed with a bunch of the settings to get it the way I want it.

author: Jason Eariss
comment: Unable to set Zulu time. Apart from that, it's great.

author: Anthony Villanova
comment: Wish you could change colors like all other faces from dev but great app
title: Good watch face

author: hunter Thomas
comment: Weather forcast doesn't work

author: Verinis
comment: I must say it is a very cool looking watch face with oodles of real utility designed into it :)
title: Very very cool

author: Cheveyo Hooxei
comment: Lots of fun enjoy all the possibilities keep up the good work and keep on adding and keep on making new ones

author: Dean Phillips
comment: Well designed face. All the data you could want and it is all configurable.
title: Great Watch Face

author: Steve Parker
comment: Need red!
title: Need red!

author: Jack Borg
comment: Would like red color though...
title: Love it

author: Simon Rayner
comment: Really nice watch face, one of the best "geeky type" faces on the play store I reckon. Bit heavy on the power consumption but still a really stunning watch face. Top marks Dev. Thanks.
title: Love it!

author: Shawn Custer
comment: A lot of info at a glimpse
title: Very cool

author: Scott Meckley
comment: On use it every few days
title: It's pretty good..

author: Paul Yoo
comment: Love everything else but the wrong weather. Should use other source like yahoo..

author: Shahram Vazirnezami
comment: 5/17/2015                                           New version fixed the issue.  Thanks for fast response.                                           Urbane and Samsung Galaxy S4 GPE, other than that the layout looks great but drains the battery, I wish we had option to turn off features like heart rate monitor.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app.Would you please check the latest version.
Thank you.

title: Battery indicator is stock on 75% and 85% for both wear and phone. Using LG

comment: Love this face. Only falt is battery meters turn white in ambient mode. Can we have them stay green. Also need to be able to disable heart rate monitor in ambient mode not just on or off. Battery draining. Otherwise great.
title: Great

author: Jared Leith
comment: Info on the face is well done, and you can see it all. Unlike others where it's too pixilated. Battery is only issue but that's too be expected with so much info going on.
title: Great info.

author: Larry Carlson
comment: A little cluttered and difficult to read.
title: Nice design

author: Rui Costa
comment: Great watch face, but it would be nice to have a configurable night mode that woul be automaticaly activated at Sunset till Sunrise, like the Ranger face. Also, a dual hour would be nice for Zulu users, like in Portugal and UK.
title: Night mode

author: Lee White
comment: This drains my battery in about 5 hours no matter what I turn off! Like the watch face though.
title: Like the face, battery sucks!

author: Le Matthew
comment: Would get five stars if it displayed step count.
title: Info plus

author: Paul Miller
comment: Great face
title: Great
